prompt: Develop a privacy policy page with a soft green background for a fresh, calming effect. Place a 'Privacy Policy' title at the top in a large, bold dark green font, aligned to the right. Include a back button in the top-left corner with a dark green icon. Below the title, add a brief introductory paragraph in dark gray text. Create three sections with subheadings ('What We Collect', 'How We Use It', 'Your Privacy') in bold dark green text, each followed by a paragraph in dark gray text. Use 18-pixel padding and 20-pixel spacing between sections. At the bottom, place a single 'Accept' button with a dark green background and white text, aligned to the right. The layout should be scrollable with a Column layout.
